HotkeyScript.name: Pause Break HK
HotkeyScript.script: if $targeting or $cavebot or $looting then setsetting("Cavebot/Enabled","no") setsetting("Targeting/Enabled","no") setsetting("Looting/Enabled","no") waitping() else setsetting("Cavebot/Enabled","yes") setsetting("Targeting/Enabled","yes") setsetting("Looting/Enabled","yes") waitping() end

PersistentScript.name: Bag opener
PersistentScript.script: auto(500) while windowcount("brown backpack") ~= 1 do pausewalking(2000) openitem($back.id,"back") wait(1000,1500) end

PersistentScript.name: PauseHotkey
PersistentScript.script: if not $cavebot or not $targeting then listas('Enabling Cavebot and Targeting') setcavebot('on') settargeting('on') wait(1000) else listas('Disabling Cavebot and Targeting') setcavebot('off') settargeting('off') stopattack() wait(1000) end

HUDScript.name: ShowWaypoints
HUDScript.script:
init start -- local SCRIPT_VERSION = '1.2.1'
local waypointColors = { walk = 0xAAF200, node = 0x2A0736, stand = 0x00AACC, shovel = 0xEB8540, rope = 0xFFCC00, machete = 0x003366, ladder = 0xC55186, use = 0x36693E, action = 0x00FFFF, lure = 0xCCCCCC }
local function deleteWaypointCall(menu) removewaypoint(menu.waypointID) end
local function moveWaypointName() if resizedWpt == nil then return tern(draggedWpt == nil, 'Move Waypoint', 'Stop Moving') end end
local function moveWaypointCall(menu) if draggedWpt == nil then draggedWpt = menu.waypoint else draggedWpt = nil end end
local function resizeWaypointName() if draggedWpt == nil then return tern(resizedWpt == nil, 'Resize Waypoint', 'Stop Resizing') end end
local function resizeWaypointCall(menu) if resizedWpt == nil then resizedWpt = menu.waypoint else resizedWpt = nil end end
registermessagehandler('contextMenu_waypoint', moveWaypointName, moveWaypointCall) registermessagehandler('contextMenu_waypoint', resizeWaypointName, resizeWaypointCall) registermessagehandler('contextMenu_waypoint', 'Delete Waypoint', deleteWaypointCall) registermessagehandler('contextMenu_waypoint', MENU_SEPARATOR, nil)
local xOffset, yOffset, worldWidth, worldHeight, x, y, z, topLeftTilePos, botRightTilePos, width, height, text, label local waypointRect = {}
function gettilepos(x, y, z) local tile = getobjectarea(x, y, z)
if tile == nil then local xDiff, yDiff = x - $posx, y - $posy if math.abs($posx - x) <= 7 then tile = getobjectarea(x, $posy, $posz) xDiff = 0 elseif math.abs($posy - y) <= 5 then tile = getobjectarea($posx, y, $posz) yDiff = 0 else tile = getobjectarea($posx, $posy, $posz) end
-- Some strange stuff happens when you go from 0 to -1, so I'm -- adding this as a precaution. if tile ~= nil then local width, height = $worldwin.width, $worldwin.height
tile.left = tile.left + (width * xDiff) tile.right = tile.right + (width * xDiff) tile.centerx = tile.centerx + (width * xDiff) tile.top = tile.top + (height * yDiff) tile.bottom = tile.bottom + (height * yDiff) tile.centery = tile.centery + (height * yDiff) end end
return tile end
useworldhud() init end
setfontstyle('Tahoma', 7, 75, 0xFFFFFF, 1, 0x000000)
xOffset, yOffset = $worldwin.left - $clientwin.left, $worldwin.top - $clientwin.top worldWidth, worldHeight = $worldwin.right - $worldwin.left - 2, $worldwin.bottom - $worldwin.top - 2
local i = 0 foreach settingsentry e 'Cavebot/Waypoints' do x, y, z = getsetting(e, 'Coordinates'):match(REGEX_SPA_COORDS) x, y, z = tonumber(x), tonumber(y), tonumber(z)
if z == $posz then width, height = getsetting(e, 'Range'):match(REGEX_SPA_SIZE) width, height = tonumber(width), tonumber(height)
topLeftTilePos = gettilepos(x, y, z) botRightTilePos = gettilepos(x + width - 1, y + height - 1, z)
if topLeftTilePos and botRightTilePos then waypointRect.left = math.max(topLeftTilePos.left , 0) waypointRect.top = math.max(topLeftTilePos.top , 0) waypointRect.right = math.min(botRightTilePos.right , worldWidth) waypointRect.bottom = math.min(botRightTilePos.bottom, worldHeight) waypointRect.width = waypointRect.right - waypointRect.left waypointRect.height = waypointRect.bottom - waypointRect.top
if waypointRect.width > 0 and waypointRect.height > 0 then label = getsetting(e, 'Label') text = tern(#label == 0, tostring(i), label .. ' (' .. i .. ')') wptType = getsetting(e, 'Type')
setfillstyle('color', (waypointColors[wptType:lower()] or 0) + (math.floor(2.55*50)*16777216)) drawroundrect( waypointRect.left, waypointRect.top, waypointRect.width, waypointRect.height, 10, 10 )
if waypointRect.width > 10 then drawtext( string.fit(text, waypointRect.width - 10, '...', true), waypointRect.left + 5, waypointRect.top + 3 ) drawtext( string.fit(wptType, waypointRect.width - 10, '...', true), waypointRect.left + 5, waypointRect.top + 15 ) end end end end
i = i + 1 end
if contextmenuinfo() == nil then if draggedWpt then set(draggedWpt, 'Coordinates', string.format('x:%i, y:%i, z:%i', $cursorinfo.x, $cursorinfo.y, $cursorinfo.z)) elseif resizedWpt then local x, y = get(resizedWpt, 'Coordinates'):match(REGEX_COORDS) x, y = tonumber(x), tonumber(y)
set(resizedWpt, 'Range', string.format('%i x %i', math.max(1, 1 + ($cursorinfo.x - x)) , math.max(1, 1 + ($cursorinfo.y - y)))) end end

Waypoint.script: while windowcount() == 0 do openitem($back.id,"back") waitping() end

if $posz ~= $wptz then gotolabel($wptid-1) else while $chest.id ~= 0 or $belt.id ~= 0 do pausewalking(500) moveitems($chest.id,ground($posx,$posy,$posz ),"chest" , 1 ) waitping() moveitems($belt.id,ground($posx,$posy,$posz ),"belt" , 1 ) waitping() end end
if not islocation() then gotolabel($wptid-1) else reachcreature("Santiago",1) waitping() waitping() say("hi") wait(1500,2000) npcsay("skip tutorial") waitping() npcsay("yes") wait(2500,3000) end

if $posz ~= $wptz then gotolabel($wptid-1) else gotolabel(0,"CollectFood") while itemcount("red apple") ~= 0 do useitem("red apple") end while $chest.id ~= 0 or $belt.id ~= 0 or $rhand.id ~= 0 do pausewalking(500) moveitems($rhand.id,ground($posx,$posy,$posz ),"rhand" , 1 ) wait(500,700) moveitems($chest.id,ground($posx,$posy,$posz ),"chest" , 1 ) wait(500,700) moveitems($belt.id,ground($posx,$posy,$posz ),"belt" , 1 ) wait(500,700) end end
if topitem($wptx, $wpty,$wptz).id == 2177 and islocation(1) then useitem(2177,ground($wptx, $wpty,$wptz)) waitping() waitping() end

if topitem($wptx, $wpty,$wptz).id == 2178 and islocation(1) then useitem(2178,ground($wptx, $wpty,$wptz)) waitping() waitping() else if topitem($wptx, $wpty,$wptz).id ~= 2177 and islocation(1) then gotolabel($wptid-1) elseif not islocation(1) then gotolabel($wptid-2) end end
if topitem($wptx, $wpty,$wptz).id == 2179 and islocation(1) then useitem(2179,ground($wptx, $wpty,$wptz)) waitping() waitping() end
if $cap <= 26 then gotolabel(0,"SellFood") end
if $cap <= 26 then gotolabel(0,"SellFood") end
if $cap <= 26 then gotolabel(0,"SellFood") end
if topitem($wptx, $wpty,$wptz).id == 2179 and islocation(1) then useitem(2179,ground($wptx, $wpty,$wptz)) waitping() waitping() end
if not islocation(4) then gotolabel($wptid-2) else gotolabel("Fences","CollectFood") end

if not islocation() then gotolabel($wptid-1) else reachcreature("Willie",1) waitping() waitping() if not $tradeopen then say("hi") waitping() waitping() waitping() waitping() npcsay("trade") waitping() waitping() if not $tradeopen then gotolabel($wptid-1) else while $tradeopen and (tradecount('sell', 'Meat')+tradecount('sell', 'Ham')) ~= 0 do sellitems('meat', tradecount('sell', 'meat')) waitping() waitping() sellitems('ham', tradecount('sell', 'ham')) waitping() waitping() end end end end

if $rhand.id ~= itemid("sabre") and gold() >= 25 then while $rhand.id ~= 0 do pausewalking(500) moveitems($rhand.id,ground($posx,$posy,$posz ),"rhand" , 1 ) waitping(500,800) end gotolabel(0,"WeaponShop") elseif $rhand.id == itemid("sabre") and gold() >= 62 then gotolabel(0,"ArmorShop") end

if not islocation() then gotolabel($wptid-1) else reachcreature("Obi",3) waitping() waitping() if not $tradeopen then say("hi") wait(1500,2000) npcsay("trade") waitping() waitping() if not $tradeopen then gotolabel($wptid-1) else while $tradeopen and gold() >= 25 and $rhand.id ~= itemid("sabre") do buyitems('sabre', 1) wait(2000,2500) end end end if $rhand.id == itemid("sabre") and gold() >= 62 then gotolabel(0,"ArmorShop") else gotolabel(0,"CollectFood") end end
if $posz ~= $wptz then gotolabel($wptid-1) end

if not islocation() then gotolabel($wptid-1) else reachcreature("Dixi",3) waitping() waitping() if not $tradeopen then say("hi") wait(1500,2000) npcsay("trade") waitping() waitping() if not $tradeopen then gotolabel($wptid-1) else while $tradeopen and gold() >= 15 and $lhand.id ~= itemid("wooden shield") do buyitems('wooden shield', 1) wait(2000,2500) end while $tradeopen and gold() >= 25 and $chest.id ~= itemid("leather armor") do buyitems('leather armor', 1) wait(2000,2500) end while $tradeopen and gold() >= 10 and $legs.id ~= itemid("leather legs") do buyitems('leather legs', 1) wait(2000,2500) end while $tradeopen and gold() >= 12 and $head.id ~= itemid("leather helmet") do buyitems('leather helmet', 1) wait(2000,2500) end if gold() >= 15 and $lhand.id ~= itemid("wooden shield") then gotolabel($wptid-1) end if gold() >= 25 and $chest.id ~= itemid("leather armor") then gotolabel($wptid-1) end if gold() >= 10 and $legs.id ~= itemid("leather legs") then gotolabel($wptid-1) end if gold() >= 12 and $head.id ~= itemid("leather helmet") then gotolabel($wptid-1) end end end end

if $posz ~= $wptz then gotolabel($wptid-1) else if gold() >= 15 and $lhand.id ~= itemid("wooden shield") then gotolabel($wptid-5) end if gold() >= 25 and $chest.id ~= itemid("leather armor") then gotolabel($wptid-5) end if gold() >= 10 and $legs.id ~= itemid("leather legs") then gotolabel($wptid-5) end if gold() >= 12 and $head.id ~= itemid("leather helmet") then gotolabel($wptid-5) end end

if not islocation(1) then gotolabel($wptid-1) else if topitem($wptx, $wpty,$wptz).id == 435 and islocation(1) then useitem(435,ground($wptx, $wpty,$wptz)) waitping() waitping() else while topitem($wptx, $wpty,$wptz).id ~= 435 do moveitems(topitem($wptx, $wpty,$wptz).id,ground($wptx, $wpty+1,$wptz),ground($wptx, $wpty,$wptz),100) waitping() end end end
if $posz ~= $wptz then gotolabel($wptid-4) else gotolabel(0,"EXP") end
if $posz ~= $wptz then gotolabel($wptid-3) end
if $level >= 4 and itemcount("rope") ~= 0 then gotolabel("Bugs") else gotolabel("Rats Again") end
if $posz ~= $wptz then gotolabel($wptid-2) end
if $posz ~= $wptz then gotolabel($wptid-3) end
if $posz ~= $wptz then gotolabel($wptid-1) end
if $posz ~= $wptz then gotolabel($wptid-2) end
if $posz ~= $wptz then gotolabel($wptid-6) end
if $posz ~= $wptz then gotolabel($wptid-1) end

if $posz ~= $wptz then gotolabel($wptid-4) else if $exp >= 4200 then gotolabel(0,"Way2Oracle") elseif gold() >= 50 and itemcount("rope") == 0 then gotolabel(0,"BuyRope") else gotolabel(0,"EXP") end end

if $posz ~= $wptz then gotolabel($wptid-5) else reachcreature("Al Dee",3) waitping() waitping() if not $tradeopen then say("hi") wait(1500,2000) npcsay("trade") waitping() waitping() if not $tradeopen then gotolabel($wptid-1) else while $tradeopen and gold() >= 50 and itemcount("rope") == 0 do buyitems('rope', 1) wait(2000,2500) end end end if itemcount("rope") == 0 and gold() >= 50 then gotolabel(0,"BuyRope") else gotolabel(3,"Way2Exp") end end
if $posz ~= $wptz then gotolabel($wptid-4) end
if $posz ~= $wptz then gotolabel($wptid-1) end
if not islocation(1) then gotolabel($wptid-1) else reachcreature("The Oracle",1) waitping() waitping() say("hi") wait(1500,2000) npcsay("yes") wait(300,500) npcsay("yes") wait(3000) end
if not islocation(1) then gotolabel($wptid-1) else gotolabel(0,"Go2End") end
if not islocation() then gotolabel($wptid-1) else reachcreature("Neill",1) waitping() waitping() say("hi") wait(1500,2000) npcsay("skip tutorial") waitping() npcsay("yes") wait(2500,3000) end
if not islocation(5) then gotolabel($wptid-1) else beep() waitping() beep() waitping() beep() waitping() beep() waitping() closeclient() end
